text: Pran Kumar Sharma (15 August 1938 â€“ 5 August 2014), better known as Pran, was an Indian cartoonist. He was best known as the creator of Chacha Chaudhary (1971). He also created other characters like Shrimatiji, Pinki, Billoo, Raman, and Channie Chachi. Sharma died on August 5, 2014 at the age of 75 in Gurgaon, India from colon cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Pran profile at Indian Institute of Cartoonists Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Indian cartoonists
title: Pran Kumar Sharma
